product_name: Big Agnes Wyoming Trail SL2 Footprint - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Protect your Big Agnes Wyoming Trail SL2 tent floor from wear and abrasion by placing this nylon taffeta footprint underneath. Sized to fit precisely underneath the tent floor and large vestibule of the Wyoming Trail SL2 tent to prevent water from pooling under tent during wet weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment. Closeout.
short_description: Protect your Big Agnes Wyoming Trail SL2 tent floor from wear and abrasion by placing this nylon taffeta footprint underneath.
